00039 iipr::CGaussianKernel2d* TGaussianProcessorComp<PixelType>::CreateKernel(const iipr::CGaussian2dFilterParams* paramsPtr)
00040 {
00041        if (paramsPtr == NULL){
00042               return NULL;
00043        }
00044

00046                                                                                                                               paramsPtr->GetSigma2(),
00047                                                                                                                               paramsPtr->GetAngle());
00048        return kernelPtr;
00049 }
